Detailed Description

Exception class used by the RApi.

An OmneException presents an error code and a corresponding error string.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OmneException::OmneException ( int  iError  )

Member Function Documentation

int OmneException::getErrorCode (  ) 

This returns the error code of the exception. A list of error codes is defined in the RApi.h header file.

const char * OmneException::getErrorString (  ) 

This returns the error string of the exception.
